description: The AWS::MemoryDB::SubnetGroup resource creates an Amazon MemoryDB Subnet Group.

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key for the tag. May not be null.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key for the tag. May not be null.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^(?!aws:)(?!memorydb:)[a-zA-Z0-9 _\.\/=+:\-@]{1,128}$  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The tag's value. May be null.
Value.markdownDescription:
The tag's value. May be null.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^(?!aws:)(?!memorydb:)[a-zA-Z0-9 _\.\/=+:\-@]{1,256}$  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

SubnetGroupName.description: The name of the subnet group. This value must be unique as it also serves as the subnet group identifier.
SubnetGroupName.markdownDescription:
The name of the subnet group. This value must be unique as it also serves as the subnet group identifier.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: [a-z][a-z0-9\-]*  
Update requires: Replacement

Description.description: An optional description of the subnet group.
Description.markdownDescription:
An optional description of the subnet group.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

SubnetIds.description: A list of VPC subnet IDs for the subnet group.

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

SubnetIds.markdownDescription:
A list of VPC subnet IDs for the subnet group.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this subnet group.
Tags.markdownDescription:
An array of key-value pairs to apply to this subnet group.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

ARN.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the subnet group.
ARN.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the subnet group.
